Body: Description: We scanned our RCH facility last Friday.  The host list to scan 30375 servers. The RESULTS, ACCESS table only reports 12453 were scanned.  Need help need to fix this,

Invitation updated. Attendees: Mike Candon, Nicholas Zimmer, Gregory Meyer
Invitation updated. Attendees: Mike Candon, Nicholas Zimmer

From: Dieter, Gregory <greg.dieter@bofa.com>

Sent: Thursday, February 13, 2025 12:28 PM

To: Mike Candon <mike.candon@netwrix.com>; Meyer, Gregory <gregory.meyer2@bofa.com>

Subject: RE: Netwrix Support Ticket #00435648

 

You don't often get email from greg.dieter@bofa.com. Learn why this is important

 

If you email me directly, I get the emails.

I forgot to put notes in the meeting explaining the issue.

I did a lot of log scraping and database querying yesterday.

During our weekly FSAA scanning on 02/07/2025, the job JOB STATS report that it scanned 30,375 servers.

I verified all 11 proxy hosts reported scanning activity, so they were all working.

The SCAN_VALIDATION report excerpt below shows only 12,453 servers were scanned.

Scan Location

Server Count

Scan Count

Difference

RCH Scan

30375

12453

17922

+++++
TableName = Access
+++++

2025_0214: BOA Thread count increased from 9 to 20 threads
only collecting Permissions
+++++
1-FSAA System Scans_RCH > right-click  and select Properties > Job Properties > Performance TAB > Concurrent Worker Threads - 20 threads
File System Access Auditor Data Collector Wizard > Applet Settings > 
+++++
Change thread count per thread in a XML configuration file = 
1-FSAA System Scans_RCH > Queries > 
Killing the PID
+++++

+++++
Jobs > FileSystem > 0.Collection > 1-FSAA System Scans > SEE '30 changes' (upper right-hand corner)
+++++

+++++
Jobs > FileSystem > 0.Collection > 1-FSAA System Scans > Configure > Queries > Query Properties > View XML
View XML
+++++
<MAXTHREADS> - threads within the applet or per applet
<MAXFOLDERTHREADS> - threads within the applet or per applet
+++++
Jobs > FileSystem > 0.Collection > 1-FSAA System Scans > Configure > Queries > Query Properties
+++++
Jobs > FileSystem > 0.Collection > 1-FSAA System Scans > right-click and "Explore Folder"
FOLDER = JOB_1-FSAA System Scans
'SEE THE' > 'Job.change' file
+++++

Nick, Greg Dieter, Steve Jackson
